players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Let's discuss the evidence we have. I've identified Alice as the mafioso based on my investigation last night. Bob and Charlie are both dead, and Alice has no alibi for either of those nights. We should consider questioning them more closely today."
Bob: "I'm still trying to figure out what happened. I haven't seen Alice outside of the game, so her alibi is questionable at best. Let's gather more information before we accuse anyone."
You: "I will remain silent. I have no evidence to support my claims and don't want to risk anything."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.

You: "Let's discuss the evidence we have. I've identified Alice as the mafioso based on my investigation last night. Bob and Charlie are both dead, and Alice has no alibi for either of those nights. We should consider questioning them more closely today."
Bob: "I'm still trying to figure out what happened. I haven't seen Alice outside of the game, so her alibi is questionable at best. Let's gather more information before we accuse anyone."
Alice: "I will remain silent. I have no evidence to support my claims and don't want to risk anything."
